snippet: Mr. Cosby will be questioned under oath in October in a case involving accusations that he sexually assaulted a young woman in 1974, a judge said on Wednesday.
abstract: California judge orders Bill Cosby to be questioned under oath in October in second case involving accusations that he sexually assaulted California woman Judy Huth in 1974, when she was a teenager.

byline.original: By GRAHAM BOWLEY and SYDNEY EMBER

lead_paragraph: Mr. Cosby will be questioned under oath in October in a case involving accusations that he sexually assaulted a young woman in 1974, a judge said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Bill Cosby Ordered to Testify in Second Sexual Assault Case
headline.print_headline: Cosby Ordered to Testify in Second Sexual Assault Case
